name: Death-Battle 2200 (C64)
description:
A Game for TheC64Maxi/C64Mini/Commodore 64 or a Good C64 Emulator.

1 Player Hard Shoot Everything Car Game in Fake 2.5D, Avoid Holes in the Road and Barrier's.

Made with the Sideways Shoot 'Em' Up Construction Kit by Sensible Software and Jon Wells.

Made and Works on Pal Commodore 64.
